website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-use LCD display helps you keep track of your progress. Hydraulic soft-drop mechanism aids you when  unfolding.
pros: LCD digital monitor allows you to track your progress
Handrails include heart rate monitors, which can be displayed on screen
Wheels helps to transport the equipment when folded
Hydraulic folding system takes most of the work out of unfolding the treadmill
cons: Some users complained the belt needs to be regularly readjusted

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I think part of the advantage a lot of treadmill companies have is most people only use their product for a few months until it becomes a coat hanger. Unfortunately, I actually use mine and it has already stopped working in less than 6 months. I ONLY walk on this at a 2 speed and it is already broken. If you are looking for an expensive hanger this is perfect. If you want a treadmill for long term use spend a few extra bucks and buy a better one. Expensive lesson for me....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the worst purchases I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I wasnt expecting a high quality treadmill but I was hoping that it would work. In addition to being completely worthless, this purchase is a total time and energy suck. 1. Turns on but does not run 2. Safety magnet was clearly made for another model because it's not at all compatible with this machine. And it's required for the belt to run. 3. Machine is cracked in several places 4. Assembly and operating instructions in Spanish only (I cant read Spanish). AND FOR A COMPLETELY DIFFERENT TREADMILL. 5. Huge waste of my time and energy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Find better
customer_reviews.text: When I received the treadmill in the mail some of the plastic was cracked near handles which I was willing to over look. I had this product for little over a week and the motor already started to go bad. I contacted sunny fitness and after a few proof purchase pictures and a video they are sending me new motor. Very fast customer service which is good. But let it be noted that the structure has a three year warranty but the parts only have a 90 day warranty from day of purchase. I find this extremely disappointing... So guess it's good motor broke early
customer_reviews.author: d dooly

customer_reviews.title: Over three years and still going strong!!
customer_reviews.text: Figured after three years of use with usually anywhere form 4-5 30+ minute workouts weekly it's worth the review. Works great still! Love this little treadmill. Helped me lose 40 pounds and keep it off. I prefer working out at home rather than the gym and this is a great little machine to do that with. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Customer support is nonexistent. Be cautious.
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied. Product arrived with the motor cover cracked. Immediately took pics and contacted amazon. Was told they couldn’t replace but would contact manufacturer under their warranty and we would hear back within 24-48 hours. It has not been almost 3 weeks and no response. The cover won’t even stay on when folded up because it is cracked at three of the four connected points. Lack of customer support is appalling considering it is under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Jin

customer_reviews.title: Very good treadmill
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. I received this treadmill on September 2020. When I opened the box everything’s good. Maybe don’t listen to bad reviews. Mine was perfect and please read the manual before start using the treadmill. I will update again in few months.
customer_reviews.author: shiela

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble however there is bending in the metal near base where the screws were to hold the unit closed. Was unable to get those screws all the way back in after placing the 3 allen screws on each side. Not sure if that will pose any safety issues. After I stood up to screw in the Allen screws to the top console, that's when I noticed a crack and discoloration in the right cup holder area. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BabyBlessedness

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Product missing pieces. Belt is on crooked. Plastic on machine is all cracked. Oil to lube the track was not sealed and leaked all over the machine. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last one full year!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this treadmill in December, 2017. This is August, 2018 and the motor went bad. This treadmill didn’t last even one full year! I’m a 4 foot 11, 125 pound woman.....I didn’t exactly wear it out!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debchet

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, but does not work.
customer_reviews.text: It does not work. Waited for slow delivery because of the pandemic...OK. Received it, assembled it, plugged it in, nothing happens. Emailed manufacturer, got a reply a week ago that they are slowed down, presumably by the pandemic. So here I sit (without walking on the treadmill) watching the purchased protection plan count down. Hope the company will come through for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kingsbury

customer_reviews.title: SOUNDS LIKE IT WILL EXPLODE
customer_reviews.text: This product is so loud that it is useless. Sounds like it will explode at any moment. The company does not care. Update 9/25/2020- sent SIX emails to customer service. Included a video so they can hear how bad it is. They responded once asking for the serial number. I responded and included another video showing it had only gotten worse. No further response despite multiple emails. The company does not care.
customer_reviews.author: T Lauria

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow, but works really well.
customer_reviews.text: It's a small and easy to manage equipment. Runs smoothly too. The only down side I have noticed to date is that it is very narrow. I hit my arm on the side handle when walking. So, I have to adjust that. I'm 5'2" and 140lbs. I imagine that a person that is much heavier and/or wider on the hips than I am would find it a little challenging. Other than that, it is great and would fit a small space, which is the reason I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: MCKH

customer_reviews.title: The motor refuses to work in a month and there is no customer service
customer_reviews.text: This one worked only for a month then the motor stopped working. Amazon could not help as the item was out of 30 day return period. I purchased a 3rd-party warranty, which could not also take care of the issue because of the manufacturer's warranty (6 months) was still active. However, the manufacturer does not respond to my request to take care of the issue. They don't pick up the customer's service phone and do not respond to emails. This is by far the most horrible customer service experience I have ever experienced. STAY AWAY FROM THIS PRODUCT AND COMPANY.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hur

customer_reviews.title: Burning smell, Significant speed reduction and extremely week motor
customer_reviews.text: Just After five months smells like burning, although i use Lubricant regularly. Even with speed of five out of ten, it barley moves.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a good treadmill for the price. Easy to store away and small enough to fit in a corner. My complaint is the belt. It keeps bulging up in places and it slips back and forth if you are going at a speed below 3.2 we have to fix it every time we go to get on it. But it goes right back to where it was. Very annoying. Also the handle bars are too narrow so I keep hitting the back of my hands on them when I walk.
customer_reviews.author: BPeeples

customer_reviews.title: Came broken.
customer_reviews.text: Came with the rubber foot at the front missing making the treadmill wobbly. I had to repackage it back during the set up process without even turning it on. Great price but not so great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Scott the Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Small, but just the right kind of small. It fits and holds me well and I’m 215lbs with wide and thick lower body so, it could pretty much hold the majority of people. It came with lubrication oil. I purchased one thinking it wouldn’t come with any, but it comes with a small bottle. I wouldn’t buy any oil until you end up needing more. Easy to install, comes with a little wrench thing for the assembly and all the nuts, washers and bolts you need. It is heavy to bring into the house, but installation was simple, just follow the instructions step by step and you’ll be fine, of course.
customer_reviews.author: MikasaG.

customer_reviews.title: Quality problems create unsafe condition when in use.
customer_reviews.text: Received mid-November. Used 3-5 x/week, walking for 30 minutes at max 3mph. Mid June 2020 motor began malfunctioning. Surprise, unexpected, irregular speed changes while in use causes loss of balance. Sunny Health customer service slow response. They finally just sent us email telling us how to order replacement motor. ($80.) must have PayPal payment first, then they will ship motor. PayPal confirmed payment and yet no communication from Sunny Health has been received. Reading other reviews this motor issue is a common quality complaint for them. Probably why it’s only warranted for 6 months. You get what you pay for. I recommend you don’t purchase this unit, for quality and safety reasons.
customer_reviews.author: LMCMF

customer_reviews.title: Decent but annoying Bell flaw
customer_reviews.text: I paid about $ 350 including tax for this treadmill , decent for the price but like other reviewer said. , you will keep having to have do belt justments maybe daily .. this machine do have a big flaw with the belt staying Center .. I took two pictures of the rear of the belt with measurements . this keeps my treadmill 95% centered.. but almost daily with use I might have to do a quarter-turn adjustment either way .. on both sides.. I'm keeping it , it's a decent treadmill .. but this is one of the annoying things about this treadmill.. the struggle is real
customer_reviews.author: Darkside

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working motor burnt
customer_reviews.text: I bought this treadmill in 2017 and used it lightly running twice a week for 20 minutes @ average of 5.6 miles/hr. I did regular maintanace as per the manual like oiling etc. This morning it died on me and stopped working and I could smell something burning. I think the motor was charred as I could see some black powder on the floor. I will not recommend this. Also looks like a safety hazard. The previous one that I had worked for 10 years without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Shahbaz

customer_reviews.title: Exceed my expectations
customer_reviews.text: We loved how easy it was to “assemble” I felt like it pretty much came assembled we just had to put some screws on it. It’s small enough to fit in our room and big enough to run on. My husband and I both love it. We’ve had it a little over a week. I honestly didn’t think it was going to be a great buy because it was so cheap but it exceeds my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabel

customer_reviews.title: Nice treadmill until today!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this the end of January and have been using it every day. It has been a nice replacement until this morning. When you adjust the speed to what we’ve been using the treadmill is running about twice as fast as before. We have turned it on and off and still has the problem. We have loved it up till today. We need help getting parts for this speed problem.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Broke after ONE MONTH!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't give out 1 stars. I got this treadmill in May, and now it's June, it already has this loud weird noise in the motor, too loud that if I run on it, I think it will break..... I‘ve sent email and call the customer service number but no reply? No one wants to go through the hassle of fixing this, just want to have a working treadmill !
customer_reviews.author: Icecube

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my treadmill for a week and I am not happy at all with it’s quality! Have used every day and without exception, had to adjust the belt after every use. The belt keeps going to the right side and start making squeaking sounds. It is very annoying that a brand new treadmill has such a poor quality that it needs to be adjusted after every use, even though I never run it faster than 3.5mph. I’s a shame since the product looks nice, but poor quality and I’ve unfortunately thrown out its packaging, otherwise I would have returned it and ask for a refund. Calling their help desk has not been useful as no one answers the calls.
customer_reviews.author: NedK

customer_reviews.title: cannot contact repair service with 3-year protection plan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product about 2 years ago. I haven't using it for a long time and recently I found it didn't work. I bought the 3-year protection plan before so still eligible to get it fixed., I tried to contact the repair service by phone call, email, none of them worked for me. I don't know where I can find the customer service for the 3 year protection plan and get it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Ohmygoddess

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this item ...I have received this item relatively fast, the box had damages but the overall state of the treadmill was fine. I put the treadmill together and started a smooth run on it for about 10 min and I felt the belt coming off shifting left!! I was like what the heck?? so I read the instruction and adjusted the both the right and left bot as indicated and I could reset the belt to the center. I tried to run again and after 10 min the belt is coming off again!! I was disappointed with this purchase! I DON't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: abraham

customer_reviews.title: broke in less than 6 months of daily use
customer_reviews.text: the platform under the belt cracked, a little bit over time and then one day just split apart and started spewing powdery stuff everywhere. my husband and i are of average size and weight. this did not hold up to daily use from 2 people. bought it in June, by Oct 1st it was un-usable. had to ask amazon for a full refund to buy another brand, which they provided with no problem. anyone need spare parts?
customer_reviews.author: rlh

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 10 months.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst treadmill I’ve ever purchased. I bought this treadmill for the low price and favorable reviews. Now , I’m beginning to wonder how many of these reviews are unbiased or verified reviews. I began to have issues with the belt after only two or three months and had to constantly tighten and lubricate the belt. I continued to use it and after less than ten months the treadmill is no longer working. I understand the purchase was on the inexpensive end, however it would behoove you to spend a little more money on something you can actually use for more than ten months.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Noise complaint from neighbors for max speed of 2.5
customer_reviews.text: Within 2-3 days of using the treadmill, i have received multiple complaints from the neighbors about the pounding noise. I have only been walking on it at max speed of 2.5. Never ran on it. Not even for testing the higher speed. Im 160lb. The shock absorption is completely ineffective, in spite of using a 1" thick ProsourceFit mat under the equipment. I cant return the equipment, since i have discarded all box and packaging elements. My neighbors wont let me use it either. It is the dumbest investment I ever made. What a waste. People in apartments, please double think before buying this. This wont work for apartments.
customer_reviews.author: Anne A

customer_reviews.title: Defective screw made my job tough to assemble. - please look into it.
customer_reviews.text: The assembling was supposed to be easy, but i got a defective screw which was cross screwed in the stopper which stops from open the handle bar. and i have to saw and cut it out to open and fix the handle bars. Was a painful task.
customer_reviews.author: Martial

customer_reviews.title: we use it in a near daily basis and it works good. I would recommend buying this
customer_reviews.text: Re-writing the review (improved from 3 to 5 stars): Sunny Health & Fitness has great customer service. I bought 2 of these (one for me and another for my mother), first one came with some manufacturer problems, upon letting know the manufacturer about this they were immediately at a helping disposition. the 2nd treadmill arrived damaged (likely from S&H). manufacturer again immediately responded and provided me with a replacement cover (the damaged part). based on both treadmill quality and their customer service, I highly recommend this device
customer_reviews.author: EPB

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Loud
customer_reviews.text: I received this treadmill today. The box was slightly damaged, but the treadmill seemed to be fine cosmetically. It was easy to put together, and I followed the instructions that said to lubricate the belt. Once I turned it on, the motor was unbelievably loud. I live in an apartment, and the level of noise this treadmill made was unacceptable. In addition to the sound of the belt moving, there was a constant chirping, a slower thumping, and a separate much faster thumping that increased as the speed increased. This was all happening without me being on it. It sounded exactly like my washing machine/dryer. I'm returning it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Colvin

customer_reviews.title: product so cheap broke so easy
customer_reviews.text: First of all I waited 2months to get this treadmill. After all that I was so excited to do my workout at home while I was 10weeks off work, but once I opened the box my treadmill came all damage can’t work at all so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Feven Zighe

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed about this treadmill I had to return it, after 3 use the belt was keep shifting due to belt defective I fell & hurt myself I won’t recommend it to anyone & don’t waste your time & money .
customer_reviews.author: Malia

customer_reviews.title: Good until the it’s not
customer_reviews.text: Great product at great..... Unfortunately they are just not built to last. My tread mill has so far been great but it has started to make some very concerning noises....
customer_reviews.author: Christie Wise

customer_reviews.title: I worried about assembly more than I should have
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be an easy to assemble item as long as you 1) took the time to read the instructions and 2) stayed calm. I assembled it (alone) with no problems. I strongly suggest you bribe the delivery driver to help you bring it into the room where you will unpack it. So far, it works great, and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: LoveWorksDotComTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great basic treadmill, long lifespan
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this back in July 2015 and it’s still going strong! I use it for walking/running while watching tv and it’s been a solid treadmill. It’s not too heavy and easy to fold up and clean around. I’m still very satisfied with my purchase and would definitely recommend this treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Misc

customer_reviews.title: Good treadmill fare price, I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this treadmill after my cousin in Chicago got one and loves hers. I was able to use our stimulus check to purchase it. It took weeks to arrive and then had a motor issue. I was impatient and very discouraged having waited so long only now to not be able to use it. Long story short, SunnyHealthFitness was very patient with me doing the best they could under these difficult times, helped me resolve the issue with the motor and now I have a great running treadmill that I will recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Tallant

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months of use
customer_reviews.text: It started out good but after 3 months quit working. I can't get any support from anyone... crickets.... sad because I really liked it.....
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Good Treadmill for Light Use
customer_reviews.text: I only needed a treadmill for light walking (around 3 mph) and the treadmill is good for that and they display and controls are very easy to read and comfortable to use. I like the hand rails because my balance is not good. The only thing I do not like about this treadmill is that it is a little bit tricky to fold the belt down and that when you fold it up, it does not fold to a 90 degree angle so it takes up more space than if it did.
customer_reviews.author: Lori in VA

customer_reviews.title: Treadmill Problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought this treadmill on March 4th 2020 and started giving problems the beginning of August, this morning August 14th it completely stopped working. Called Amazon and they guided me through a "Trouble Shoot" process and it was determined that the motor has failed. Amazon then offered to replace with a new unit and return the old to them. I will be ding this. All I have to say is Amazon is the "BEST" and am so appreciative of the way they resolve problems especially with this expensive product
customer_reviews.author: Charles  McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the t-44000 treadmill in July 2015. Worked great. Then about a month or so later, I was unable to use it for about a year. I tried to get back on it last night, for the first time in a while. It came on but I couldn't get it to do anything other that the default 0.5 speed. This thing has MAYBE at most 15 hrs of use and is no longer any good to me. Such a shame. The mfg warranty is only 1 year. Figures.... Don't even know where I could possibly get it worked on....can't say I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Melody R.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is a hard review to write. This treadmill was easy to set up and was quiet...... Until just one week later and now there is this really annoying clicking sound. So bummed. I'll keep using it until it totally breaks, then I hope to buy a better one. ***update- it's still running but now it has added a grinding sound along with the clicking. I'm just going to use it until it finally breaks down. Then I'm going to do better research and buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Unpacking
customer_reviews.text: The treadmill comes in an approximate 3' x 7' x 1' box and instructions are to open it and lift it out. It is quite heavy particularly on the motor end and lifting it was out of the question so we cut the side of the box open and slide it out. Some of the packing remained on the bottom so we propped the light end up and pulled it out. Once unpacked and assembled (not difficult) it is a very good treadmill particularly for those desiring a low or zero elevation.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Schoenbeck

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: Warranty is 90 days. Broke after 91 days. Motor won't run even though console works.
customer_reviews.author: Mangler09

customer_reviews.title: Motor broke within 6 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: The treadmill broke after 6 weeks of use (2 hours per day). Sparks flying from the motor. Treadmill no longer moves. Initiated return but if the manufacturer wants to contact us to send us only the spare parts we can do the repair ourselves, otherwise we will continue the return process.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: game over after one year
customer_reviews.text: never buy sunny treadmill again. stopped working after one year of normal use. burning smell and keep turning off during normal workout time.
customer_reviews.author: Vibez

customer_reviews.title: Much better than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: This was a surprise for me. Though narrow than I figured, overall the unit is very well made. I am a heavier person (over 200lbs) and do some moderate running on this machine. Over past three weeks, it has done a good job and is holding up well. I average 18-24 miles a week and I land heavy, but this treadmill does the job well. Note: for walking, my wrist will hit the hand rails, so I have slightly adjusted my arms for this. For running, no issue at all.
customer_reviews.author: eewdad

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine for the money, and excellent for an elderly person who wants to keep in shape during the quarantine. Assembly took a lot longer than I liked because the screw and the bracket to keep it safe during shipment was a pain in my finger because the screw was bent and stripped, it took me 45 minutes to get it off. Afterward, it took about 30 minutes but the belt needed adjusting a day later.
customer_reviews.author: Dharma

customer_reviews.title: Overall good basic treadmill
customer_reviews.text: This treadmill is decent for the price. I did notice that the speeds are a little off. I was doing a HIIT workout and set the speed at 9 but it felt easy. My FitBit also did not match with the pace.. around 25% off so 9mph is really 6mph. The main reason I chose this option was it had higher speeds for the price available. I still get a decent workout from it but it's not all that it is advertised as.
customer_reviews.author: Antonina Moskalets

customer_reviews.title: Overall View
customer_reviews.text: Shipment was quick and although the box was a little damaged the product itself wasn’t. This treadmill is okay for beginners. I find that it is too narrow and every now and then my hands hit the corner of the hold bar. I feel like at lower speeds, the belt gets stuck momentarily. Overall good treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Precious

customer_reviews.title: Treadmill i needed for home
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our home this summer and it was really a worth purchase using it for 6 months and never had a problem it was very easy to assemble and started using in about 30 mins. Liked the quality of this treadmill for better than the cheap ones I was looking for. It has a tablet holder and a cup holder and It also has 3 levels of height adjustments would have been better if there were a couple more and the plastic for stop magnet broke so we need to secure the magnet otherwise I can't use this. Overall it's a good purchase and what I needed for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: DilMaRK

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't start after using for less than 2 months and following all instructions. The power came on, the key was in, but would not start. Fortunately Amazon assured a refund despite it being impossible to repackage and send back. The way it's packaged to begin with requires damaging the package to unwrap.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: If you buy-INSURE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This machine was great for about 2 months. It was at two months it began to run slower and slower until it was obvious that the MPH couldn't be trusted and it was malfunctioning. After turning it off completely, I left it alone for the day. The next day it wouldn't come on at all. Absolute junk. I was very disappointed. I bought the machine to walk as part of a vital therapy program due to a health concern. Thank goodness I had purchased the insurance. The full amount was refunded back to my form of payment and I ordered...A DIFFERENT BRAND! I like it much better.
customer_reviews.author: becca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect treadmill at an amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this treadmill! It’s the perfect size for our space. It’s pretty quiet so I can workout while others are working in the same room. My daughter runs about two miles on it every morning. I walk 10-30 minutes at a time, multiple times throughout the day, everyday. This unit was so easy to put together. It only took me 15-20 minutes after unpacking it. We have had it for a week now and it’s running smoothly with no hiccups so far. I highly recommend this treadmill for moderately serious workouts. I don’t think it would hold up to avid runners and such, but it’s excellent for those who desire to stay healthy and active.
customer_reviews.author: Nickums25

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that was smaller and lightweight but didn't feel too cheap and performed well. This hits the mark for exactly what I needed. I run 3 miles, about 5 days and week and it holds up well. It was easy to assemble and for the price looks nice. The length is on the smaller side but I am 5'9 with a long stride and it doesn't feel like I am falling off. Only issue is that it slides on hardwood floor while running so you just have to get a mat or something to put under it to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Chopp

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!! And very happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I finally decided to order a treadmill after reading what seemed like hundreds of reviews, I chose this one. Sadly, it couldn’t be delivered to me, so I had it delivered to a friend 40 miles away. The set up was pretty easy (once I took a deep breath and didn’t let the schematics get the best of me 😉) I used it today, and so far LOVE it... I’ll update if needed!
customer_reviews.author: TR Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Really great treadmill for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this treadmill about 2 months ago and my partner and I run on it about 30-45 min a day each. It has held up really well and we are both very impressed by it. It is sturdy, your feet don't shift or stick on it and you can run slightly faster and it doesn't feel like it's going to fall apart. It's great! Plus the price was really affordable. I am pretty happy with it overall.
customer_reviews.author: LArce

customer_reviews.title: Terrific price for a durable product!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I needed! I got it after my daughter got one. I wanted to verify the size and performance and I was not disappointed. I keep and use it in my sunroom. The size is perfect because it is not overpowering. I am able to walk everyday now...Yay!! I do 2.5 miles per day while watching TV. My very tall teenage grandson also uses it everyday. My daughter runs 3 miles on hers each day. It’s easy to move. I simply pull it forward and unfold it when needed, then fold and push it back when done. I love it!! It arrived on time and is exactly as described. Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: EOB

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good...feels like any gym treadmill
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good... I’ve been using it for a week now and I love it. It feels like any gym treadmill and I run between 4.5-6mph for at least 30 minutes every day. In other words, it feels really solid and reliable. My husband is 6.2’ and says it’s hard for him to see the screen, but he says it feels fine when he runs and he’s 210lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanizzler

customer_reviews.title: Best Cheap Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Goes up to 9mph - The platform hasn't caved in (like other cheap treadmills) from my jumping/jogging - Wide and long enough Cons - Motor started making noises less than a year in (single person use), and it appears the clips covering the brushes require a special tool to pull out, making it impossible to replace the brushes without the tool
customer_reviews.author: Adam F. F.

customer_reviews.title: This treadmill is perfect for what it is - a compact running machine
customer_reviews.text: This treadmill is perfect for what it is - a compact running machine. It stores with the running surface folded up most of the way, and it is easy to move. It is pleasant to run on and has intuitive and relevant controls. The few minor drawbacks I have found are that the water bottle holder isn't quite big enough, and I hit the handles with my arms sometimes, because they are narrower than on standard models. But I think I will adjust to this with more use. It is not super quiet - you definitely need headphones to hear music or tv. I like it overall though, and I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Gil Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Not working as expected
customer_reviews.text: Whenever i start running, it tripping my main power switch, it happens every time i tried to walk fast or slow run.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish Tripathi

customer_reviews.title: Have used it for 2.5 years, still kicking.
customer_reviews.text: Does not let you go past 99:59 mins. It turns off and says END. It was super quiet last year when I got it but after a few months it is a bit loud, even with oiling the belt. Max speed is 9mph but at speeds over 6mph, sounds like it will blow up. I dont much care because I am not a runner. Hard to program and the little peg legs give almost no incline but other than that, a solid machine if you just want to casually walk or jog. Ive put hundreds of miles on it in the couple years I've owned it so it is worth the money and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Corrina Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Great Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived today and I Love it for walking and for fast walking. I'm a senior citizen and it's everything I wanted. I keep it inclined for a better workout. I live where the Winters can be brutally freezing so this was my solution. I'm planning on using it daily, not to hang clothing on. I'll update my review after I've had it for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy dangerous
customer_reviews.text: It is very difficult to center the walking belt. I hadn't had it a day before the belt was off center. No matter what I do I can't get it right. I just wasted my money on a product I can't use or return. Revised review after months trying to get this centered the belt split on me near injured. Do not keep this if it's not centered dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's super easy to convert to a desk treadmill
customer_reviews.text: WALKING/DESK TREADMILL LIFEHACK: - Buy this treadmill. - Unscrew the vertical supports. - Unplug the controller unit at the top & bottom of the right support. - Remove the supports. - Plug the controller unit back into the motor/base. - Lay the controller on top of the motor. I've been using this a few hours a day this week and have had no problems. It's super easy to convert to a desk treadmill, and narrow/flat enough to fit under pretty much any workstation. Great price for a solid device with some customizability. Give it a shot!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: The backstory on this is my intensely bad experience with a Nordic Track bought through Sears with a prohibitvely expensive warranty and a machine that never worked correctly and resulted in a long and difficult return. Which makes me love my Sunny treadmill even more because it was insanely easy to assemble--one hour from starting to open the box to running on a lubricated machine. It works well. No complaints. The only thing you might miss is that you have to get off the machine to change the incline. For the price, this machine can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I love the price of this treadmill and that is what made me jump on it. I only do cardio to stay inside my weightlifting class. Pros: folds, good size for a home gym, sturdy, price, programs and modes are good for beginner to intermediate runners Cons: slightly narrower than a commercial unit so I smack my hands on the handles all the time. doesn't fold all the way vertical so it sticks out about 2-3 ft when stored, just an annoyance not really an issue in an open space home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Remus

customer_reviews.title: Very Heavy!!!
customer_reviews.text: The box was very heavy for two elderly gents! We did manage to unpack it and put it together. Turned it on and "nothing" ... I was fairly upset ... called the company and was told to send an email which wouldn't be answered for two or three business days. I decided to take the cover off of the motor where the wiring was and found two wires that either had not been attached or had come unattached during shipping. Plugged them in and away it went and I've been very pleased with it ever since. Runs very quietly. I did put it on a pad.
customer_reviews.author: David Decou

customer_reviews.title: You can't stop thinking about the sound.
customer_reviews.text: The item does everything it says. Assembly was easy until you need to move it, it becomes a little difficult. My only real problem was how loud it was when taking my next step. That's a big thing for me, I can't stop thinking how loud it is even when I try to soft speed talk on it. Great for a basement. Pros: The job gets done. Space Saver Sturdy folding pressure Emergency Stop Key Cons: Loud Steps Needs shock-absorbing parts
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Great home treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I'm 74 and I dragged it into my house, put it together, and walked a mile the same day. Love it. Great for the money, and I know it was less expensive before the covey 19 pandemic, but I didn't need it then. Now I do. And it is just right for walking inside, staying safe, and getting my exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Garner

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for the cost so easy to assemble and outstanding for walking. I walk at a 4mph pace for 2 hours everyday and this treasure hasn’t done me wrong. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: nicolemichellelynn

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase after reading of issues others had with the track but I've been going about 5 miles on it every day and haven't had issues. Perfect, smaller treadmill and great buy for the price. I didn't need anything fancy but was worried buying something at this price would junk but I'm so happy I bought! I'm 5 foot 2 and was able to bring into my house and assemble within 20 mins. Heavy package but definitely doable!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for a 100 pound inoperable pile of junk this is for you
customer_reviews.text: They shipped a broken one to me. I emailed them and they sent me YouTube videos then a chord. Then when we replaced the chord, a deep wire burning smell filled the room. Absolutely a waste of time and probably dangerous. I really urge you to go to Walmart and buy a decent one for the same cost. This was a chore/ pain in the ass that you do NOT need.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for amateur runners / beginner's choice. Assembly took only an hour. Small foot print but little light weight. Wouldn't recommend for users above 200 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: sana j

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable running treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I easily assembled it by myself. Fits nicely in a small apartment, folds up without a problem. I don’t use the incline as it is probably a 1.5-2 incline at the most on the highest setting, has to manually set so can’t be changed throughout the run. I’m not a fan of incline anyway so that doesn’t bother me. Runs smoothly even up to 8.5mph, not too loud. Good quality for the price, though I would recommend a device holder if you plan to watch tv on your phone or tablet or read as the console sits around mid torso level and you would have to look down the entire run/walk to see (I’m 5’7” for reference). Overall highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Very nice solid model
customer_reviews.text: My old treadmill motor died so I did a lot of searching before I settled on this one.I like the size,shape and general feel of it.The tread has a good solid feel as you run/walk on the deck,good traction.I also like that you can adjust the speed in 10ths of a mile increments,which is nice to get a comfortable pace,good digital display easy to read. If you're looking for something with a lot of features then this is not for you,but if you want a good basic model at a good price then look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Ole' Vista

customer_reviews.title: Item did not work out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was done well. Assembly was easy. Customer service was responsive. Problem, the motherboard did not work. Called customer service and was advised to take apart a few areas to check the wires and connections... all were connected and undamaged. Called customer service again, and this time I was advised to test the motor per their website troubleshooting guidelines... motor did not work. Chose to return the item. Imagine brand new out of the box and the motherboard and motor do not work. Going the NordicTrac route.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the SUNNY SF-T4400 Treadmill. It has exceeded my expectations. It was in pristine condition when I received it and It only took 1 hour to assemble. The instructions were easy to understand and complete. I ‘m 80 years old and live in a hilly area of Tennessee so I have a tough time finding level areas to get any sort of exercise. This treadmill will provide me with at least a good daily regimen to keep my legs in shape.
customer_reviews.author: KenC

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase! Best Treadmill for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Sunny and Health rowing machine so I was confident in ordering from them. Very happy with this purchase, finally getting some running done on a semi regular basis. I have my own running app so this simple treadmill was perfect for my needs. Only con is that I don't recommend getting on it unless it's going over 1.5mph as the belt will get stuck under you. I will usually start it and put it to 2mph then jump on. Not a big deal but something to take note off.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for brisk walking exercise
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have damaged knees but this treadmill enables me to do some brisk walking that is kind to my knees. The product was delivered as promised and was very easy to assemble. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MrB

customer_reviews.title: I'd highly recommend this treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I'd highly recommend this treadmill. The price was a fraction of so many other options so I was amazed that the construction and features are on a par with the pro products at the gym. It is heavy (a plus for stability) and took two people to set up. The initial lubricating of the belt necessitated creating a long 'wand' wrapped in a cloth but that was easy enough.
customer_reviews.author: KB McFarland, WI

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, solid and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and feels sturdy! I am 5'3 and 170 and it fits me quite well! Its also small enough that its not to much for my 1bd apartment! I love the added details on the arms and cup holders. I am so glad i got this, especially with all the gym closures here in vegas.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Davis

customer_reviews.title: The best Treadmill for the Price + Very easy to Assemble..
customer_reviews.text: This is a mid-sized treadmill with a 220 lbs weight limit.. Great for light jogging or brisk walking...not so great for hard running...Assembly is the easiest I've seen on a model this size.. It's 80 percent assembled right out of the box.. Literally it took me ten minutes to set up the thing.. My wife loves it and that's all that matters. Great quality and a great buy..!!!!
customer_reviews.author: anthony f.

customer_reviews.title: Weak motor result belt slip
customer_reviews.text: Weak motor. Belt slips. Im a male, 175lbs. I usually run on treadmill at anspeed of 6-8 The belt slips pretty often and it makes you feel not safe at all. Other than that, the belt is narrow, very limited funtions on the computer, takes forever to measure the heartbeat and etc. but they are all fine. I dont expect much from this inexpensive machine. I would’ve been happy if it gave me an sturdy feeling of the running belt on my workout. So if you weight more than 159-160, and if you are planning to run faster than 6, you better consider another product.
customer_reviews.author: David Lee

customer_reviews.title: Shifty treadmill
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I had a question about the treadmill I bought. I’m not sure if this specific one has a defect or all of the ones from this brand are like this, but the treadmill always shifts when I run, it’s a slow and gradual shift, I don’t notice while running, but I notice when I misstep and hit the sides because it has shifted during the run. Is this a common problem with this treadmill? I feel like I can’t even use it to run anymore which defeats the purpose of having this treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Terence Lu

customer_reviews.title: broken part ** Updated
customer_reviews.text: It function good, and meet our size requirement. But we received it with broken part. ***Update After a long waiting time in email exchange with customer service. I had the motor cover shipped to me. Overall this treadmill is doing a good job in my daily 1 hr running time. The size and feature are as described in the product detail. I updated the review from 1 star to 4 star. If there were no damage part and super long waiting time, I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: T.L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect at home machine. Gets the job done.easy to fold and adjust.
customer_reviews.text: Only 4 stars because it doesn't go as fast as most but for the price and how light it is it does an outstanding job. My 15 yearold put it together in a few min. 3 months later and no noise or complaints the only thing its the belt seems a little small for thw track it moves to one side a bit but I haven't noticed it afgecting its performance. This machine it's perfect for those who can't find time at gym and can't go out running mid winter.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: All good so far!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this treadmill closes up easily ten drops down slowly. The belt is a little thinner than I’m used to but I have had no issues with it. Read the answers to questions because I learned it’s important to lube the belt
customer_reviews.author: DeeGirl

customer_reviews.title: It has worked great
customer_reviews.text: For my purposes, it has worked great. It's assembled and heavy, though. It does have an incline due to the fact that the motor is in the front bottom of unit. I have no idea what the incline is, but be warned.
customer_reviews.author: mommabee

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price :)
customer_reviews.text: I’m so pleasantly surprised with how sturdy & easy this was to set up! Also, I did a 30 minute HIIT workout today, transitioning smoothly from 2.5 mph to 7mph (I’m just 5’ tall) & it didn’t skip once. Folds super easily as well. Great value. I’ll update after a month or so! The delivery person was awful though! They dropped it off out front at like 6am! I live in the middle of the city & was lucky my neighbor knocked to let me know!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The belt keeps moving!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and am unable to work out on this because the belt keeps moving. No matter how tight I tighten the screws it moves and that's walking at 1.8mph. I got this to jog on!! How on earth am I going to use this? I can't even talk to support because they're unavailable!!! HELP!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I really love the treadmill. I haven't had it long but I dig it. I mainly walk from 2.0-4.0. It did come with a few marks but I still think it's great. Super Heavy to carry in the box to your house so if you can get help get help. I manage to carry it in but I didn't have to go far.
customer_reviews.author: Momofthreeonthego

customer_reviews.title: Love love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love this treadmill. I run on it everyday for and hour. My husband used it too. We are not big people but I’m used to a gym treadmill. I love love this this one. Amazing for the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bewley-Vaca

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: The treadmill came broken. The arm had several dents and the paint was peeling off. I returned it. Although I didn't assemble it, it appeared to be small and cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: leopardqueen84

customer_reviews.title: great treadmill!
customer_reviews.text: love this treadmill! after doing a lot of research, this is exactly what I needed. lower cost, does not take up a lot of room, I feel comfortable walking and running on it and think it is a quality treadmill. only warning is the shipment is VERY heavy though. I definitely would not have even been able to get it into my house and/or basement without my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Damaged cover...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this treadmill for my boyfriend as he has an upcoming competition sometime in March and with a full-time job & sometimes has to work late, it can be difficult for him to make it to the gym most days. Although this machine works pretty well and it was easy to assemble it did come in with a broken cover. What is interesting is that the actual box was not damage just the treadmill, which makes me think that they purposely sent the item damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: It is not hard to assemble if you follow the directions in the book
customer_reviews.text: bought t this exercise equipment so that I can walk while I'm watching TV. I read the reviews before I made the purchase. When it came it took me 30 minutes to put it together everything was there.. Since I purchased it I've had no issues and I love the machine! it is quiet so I can hear the TV while I'm walking and I enjoy using it I have no complaints .
customer_reviews.author: Happy Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy for hubby to put together in less than 30 minutes. Seems sturdy enough for fast walking, enough for what I use it for. The pulse grips don't work accurately. I like the controls on the hand grips and how nicely it folds itself down. Belt is good size but my hands often hit the hand grips when I let them swing by my sides. This was a perfect fit for my space and walking needs.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

product_meta.title: Sunny Health & Fitness Folding Treadmill with Device Holder, Shock Absorption and Incline
feature_bullets: 2.20 peak HP drive system provides speeds of 0. 5 - 9 MPH along with 3 manual options for adjusting incline levels (0%, 2%, 4. 37%)
Designed for a max user weight of 220 lbs. with 49L x 15. 5W inches of running surface
Easy folding mechanism and soft drop system helps you unfold your treadmill safely and hands free
Handrail controls allow you to control speed, start and stop. Pause function - Press the stop button once to stop the belt and pause your run while keeping your current data and running stats intact
9 Built-in workout programs with large LCD displays time, distance, speed, calories burned and pulse. Convenient smart phone/tablet holder is included to fit different devices
Included components: Treadmill, User Manual, Hardware

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
